label: GamePlayMode
comment: Indicates whether this game is multi-player, co-op or single-player.

enumerationMembers.label: CoOp
enumerationMembers.comment: Play mode: CoOp. Co-operative games, where you play on the same team with friends.

enumerationMembers.label: MultiPlayer
enumerationMembers.comment: Play mode: MultiPlayer. Requiring or allowing multiple human players to play simultaneously.

enumerationMembers.label: SinglePlayer
enumerationMembers.comment: Play mode: SinglePlayer. Which is played by a lone player.
